Week 1

Day 1: Thursday, June 18, 2020

  • Session 00: Introduction
    • Zoom
    • RStudio Cloud
    • Workflow tips and tricks
  • Session 01: Visualize
    • Introduction and basics
    • Mappings and aesthetics
    • Facets
    • Geoms, stat and position arguments
    • What else can I do? (scales, scale_color_brewer(), titles and captions, themes, ggThemeAssist)
    • Saving your plot

Day 2: Friday, June 19, 2020

  • Day 1 Recap

  • Session 02: Wrangle

    • dplyr functions: filter(), select(), and mutate()
    • Group-wise operations with group_by() and summarize()
    • Sorting data using arrange()
    • Reshaping data with tidyr functions: pivot_longer() and pivot_wider()
    • EXTRA (if there is time): working with dates and times using lubridate

  • Week 1 Homework
